accept.description: Specifies the types of files that the server accepts (only for type="file")

accept-charset.description: Specifies the character encodings that are to be used for the form submission

accesskey.description: Global Attributes Specifies a shortcut key to activate/focus an element

action.description: Specifies where to send the form-data when a form is submitted

align.description: Not supported in HTML 5. Specifies the alignment according to surrounding elements. Use CSS instead

alt.description: Specifies an alternate text when the original element fails to display

async.description: Specifies that the script is executed asynchronously (only for external scripts)

autocomplete.description: Specifies whether the <form> or the <input> element should have autocomplete enabled

autofocus.description: Specifies that the element should automatically get focus when the page loads

autoplay.description: Specifies that the audio/video will start playing as soon as it is ready

behavior.description: Establece cómo se desplazará el texto en la etiqueta marquee. Los valores posibles son scroll, slide, y alternate. Si no hay un valor especificado, el valor por defecto establecido es scroll. Scroll: Hara que lo que este en la marquesina se mueva de derecha a izquierda, de manera ininterrumpida. Slide: Una vez que completa el recorrido de derecha a izquierda(por defecto) se detiene. Alternate: Se movera de una esquina a la otra, dando el efecto de rebote.

bgcolor.description: Not supported in HTML 5. Specifies the background color of an element. Use CSS instead

border.description: Not supported in HTML 5. Specifies the width of the border of an element. Use CSS instead

checked.description: Specifies that an <input> element should be pre-selected when the page loads (for type="checkbox" or type="radio")

cite.description: Specifies a URL which explains the quote/deleted/inserted text

class.description: Global Attributes Specifies one or more classnames for an element (refers to a class in a style sheet)

color.description: Not supported in HTML 5. Specifies the text color of an element. Use CSS instead

cols.description: Specifies the visible width of a text area

colspan.description: Specifies the number of columns a table cell should span

content.description: Gives the value associated with the http-equiv or name attribute

contenteditable.description: Global Attributes. Specifies whether the content of an element is editable or not

controls.description: Specifies that audio/video controls should be displayed (such as a play/pause button etc)

coords.description: Specifies the coordinates of the area

data.description: Specifies the URL of the resource to be used by the object

data-*.description: Global Attributes. Used to store custom data private to the page or application

default.description: Specifies that the track is to be enabled if the user's preferences do not indicate that another track would be more appropriate

defer.description: Specifies that the script is executed when the page has finished parsing (only for external scripts)

dir.description: Global Attributes. Specifies the text direction for the content in an element

direction.description: Establece la dirección en la que el texto contenido se desplazará. Los valores posibles son left (para moverse hacia la izquierda), right (para moverse a la derecha), up (hacia arriba) y down (hacia abajo). Si no se especifica un valor, por defecto será left.

dirname.description: Specifies that the text direction will be submitted

disabled.description: Specifies that the specified element/group of elements should be disabled

download.description: Specifies that the target will be downloaded when a user clicks on the hyperlink

draggable.description: Global Attributes. Specifies whether an element is draggable or not

enctype.description: Specifies how the form-data should be encoded when submitting it to the server (only for method="post")

for.description: Specifies which form element(s) a label/calculation is bound to

form.description: Specifies the name of the form the element belongs to

formaction.description: Specifies where to send the form-data when a form is submitted. Only for type="submit"

headers.description: Specifies one or more headers cells a cell is related to

height.description: Specifies the height of the element

hidden.description: Global Attributes. Specifies that an element is not yet, or is no longer, relevant

high.description: Specifies the range that is considered to be a high value

href.description: Specifies the URL of the page the link goes to

hreflang.description: Specifies the language of the linked document

http-equiv.description: Provides an HTTP header for the information/value of the content attribute

id.description: Global Attributes. Specifies a unique id for an element

ismap.description: Specifies an image as a server-side image map

kind.description: Specifies the kind of text track

label.description: Specifies the title of the text track

lang.description: Global Attributes. Specifies the language of the element's content

list.description: Refers to a <datalist> element that contains pre-defined options for an <input> element

loop.description: Specifies that the audio/video will start over again, every time it is finished

low.description: Specifies the range that is considered to be a low value

maxlength.description: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in an element

media.description: Specifies what media/device the linked document is optimized for

method.description: Specifies the HTTP method to use when sending form-data

multiple.description: Specifies that a user can enter more than one value

muted.description: Specifies that the audio output of the video should be muted

name.description: Specifies the name of the element

novalidate.description: Specifies that the form should not be validated when submitted

onabort.description: Script to be run on abort

onafterprint.description: Script to be run after the document is printed

onbeforeprint.description: Script to be run before the document is printed

onbeforeunload.description: Script to be run when the document is about to be unloaded

onblur.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when the element loses focus

onbounce.description: Este evento se lanza cuando la marquesina llegó al final del desplazamiento. Ésto solo se activa cuando el atributo behavior está establecido en alternate.

oncanplay.description: Script to be run when a file is ready to start playing (when it has buffered enough to begin)

oncanplaythrough.description: Script to be run when a file can be played all the way to the end without pausing for buffering

onchange.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when the value of the element is changed

onclick.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when the element is being clicked

oncontextmenu.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when a context menu is triggered

oncopy.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when the content of the element is being copied

oncuechange.description: Script to be run when the cue changes in a <track> element

oncut.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when the content of the element is being cut

ondblclick.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when the element is being double-clicked

ondrag.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when the element is being dragged

ondragend.description: All visible elements. Script to be run at the end of a drag operation

ondragenter.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when an element has been dragged to a valid drop target

ondragleave.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when an element leaves a valid drop target

ondragover.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when an element is being dragged over a valid drop target

ondragstart.description: All visible elements. Script to be run at the start of a drag operation

ondrop.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when dragged element is being dropped

ondurationchange.description: Script to be run when the length of the media changes

onemptied.description: Script to be run when something bad happens and the file is suddenly unavailable (like unexpectedly disconnects)

onended.description: Script to be run when the media has reach the end (a useful event for messages like "thanks for listening")

onerror.description: Script to be run when an error occurs

onfinish.description: Este evento se lanza cuando la marquesina repitió el desplazamiento la cantidad de veces establecidas en el atributo loop. El evento se lanza solo si el atributo loop tiene un valor mayor a 0.

onfocus.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when the element gets focus

onhashchange.description: Script to be run when there has been changes to the anchor part of the a URL

oninput.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when the element gets user input

oninvalid.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when the element is invalid

onkeydown.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when a user is pressing a key

onkeypress.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when a user presses a key

onkeyup.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when a user releases a key

onload.description: Script to be run when the element is finished loading

onloadeddata.description: Script to be run when media data is loaded

onloadedmetadata.description: Script to be run when meta data (like dimensions and duration) are loaded

onloadstart.description: Script to be run just as the file begins to load before anything is actually loaded

onmousedown.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when a mouse button is pressed down on an element

onmousemove.description: All visible elements. Script to be run as long as the  mouse pointer is moving over an element

onmouseout.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when a mouse pointer moves out of an element

onmouseover.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when a mouse pointer moves over an element

onmouseup.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when a mouse button is released over an element

onmousewheel.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when a mouse wheel is being scrolled over an element

onoffline.description: Script to be run when the browser starts to work offline

ononline.description: Script to be run when the browser starts to work online

onpagehide.description: Script to be run when a user navigates away from a page

onpageshow.description: Script to be run when a user navigates to a page

onpaste.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when the user pastes some content in an element

onpause.description: Script to be run when the media is paused either by the user or programmatically

onplay.description: Script to be run when the media has started playing

onplaying.description: Script to be run when the media has started playing

onpopstate.description: Script to be run when the window's history changes.

onprogress.description: Script to be run when the browser is in the process of getting the media data

onratechange.description: Script to be run each time the playback rate changes (like when a user switches to a slow motion or fast forward mode).

onreset.description: Script to be run when a reset button in a form is clicked.

onresize.description: Script to be run when the browser window is being resized.

onscroll.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when an element's scrollbar is being scrolled

onsearch.description: Script to be run when the user writes something in a search field (for <input="search">)

onseeked.description: Script to be run when the seeking attribute is set to false indicating that seeking has ended

onseeking.description: Script to be run when the seeking attribute is set to true indicating that seeking is active

onselect.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when the element gets selected

onstalled.description: Script to be run when the browser is unable to fetch the media data for whatever reason

onstart.description: Este evento se lanza cuando la marquesina comienza su desplazamiento.

onstorage.description: Script to be run when a Web Storage area is updated

onsubmit.description: Script to be run when a form is submitted

onsuspend.description: Script to be run when fetching the media data is stopped before it is completely loaded for whatever reason

ontimeupdate.description: Script to be run when the playing position has changed (like when the user fast forwards to a different point in the media)

ontoggle.description: Script to be run when the user opens or closes the <details> element

onunload.description: Script to be run when a page has unloaded (or the browser window has been closed)

onvolumechange.description: Script to be run each time the volume of a video/audio has been changed

onwaiting.description: Script to be run when the media has paused but is expected to resume (like when the media pauses to buffer more data)

onwheel.description: All visible elements. Script to be run when the mouse wheel rolls up or down over an element

open.description: Specifies that the details should be visible (open) to the user

optimum.description: Specifies what value is the optimal value for the gauge

pattern.description: Specifies a regular expression that an <input> element's value is checked against

placeholder.description: Specifies a short hint that describes the expected value of the element

poster.description: Specifies an image to be shown while the video is downloading, or until the user hits the play button

preload.description: Specifies if and how the author thinks the audio/video should be loaded when the page loads

readonly.description: Specifies that the element is read-only

rel.description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document

required.description: Specifies that the element must be filled out before submitting the form

reversed.description: Specifies that the list order should be descending (9,8,7...)

rows.description: Specifies the visible number of lines in a text area

rowspan.description: Specifies the number of rows a table cell should span

sandbox.description: Enables an extra set of restrictions for the content in an <iframe>

scrollamount.description: Establece el valor de movimiento para cada intervalo en pixeles. Por defecto su valor es 6.

scrolldelay.description: Establece el intervalo entre cada desplazamiento, en milisegundos. El valor por defecto es 85. Nota: Cualquier valor inferior a 60 será ignorado, (puesto que el valor minimo es 60) y se establecerá 60 en su lugar. Salvo que se especifique truespeed.

scope.description: Specifies whether a header cell is a header for a column, row, or group of columns or rows

selected.description: Specifies that an option should be pre-selected when the page loads

shape.description: Specifies the shape of the area

size.description: Specifies the width, in characters (for <input>) or specifies the number of visible options (for <select>)

sizes.description: Specifies the size of the linked resource

slot.description: Specifies the slot in a template

span.description: Specifies the number of columns to span

spellcheck.description: Global Attributes. Specifies whether the element is to have its spelling and grammar checked or not

src.description: Specifies the URL of the media file

srcdoc.description: Specifies the HTML content of the page to show in the <iframe>

srclang.description: Specifies the language of the track text data (required if kind=subtitles)

srcset.description: Specifies the URL of the image to use in different situations

start.description: Specifies the start value of an ordered list

step.description: Specifies the legal number intervals for an input field

style.description: Global Attributes. Specifies an inline CSS style for an element

tabindex.description: Global Attributes. Specifies the tabbing order of an element

target.description: Specifies the target for where to open the linked document or where to submit the form

title.description: Global Attributes. Specifies extra information about an element

translate.description: Global Attributes. Specifies whether the content of an element should be translated or not

truespeed.description: Por defecto, si los valores de scrolldelay son inferiores a 60 serán ignorados. Pero si truespeed está presente, esos valores inferiores a 60 serán aceptados.

usemap.description: Specifies an image as a client-side image map

value.description: Specifies the value of the element

vspace.description: Establece el margen vertical en pixeles o en un valor porcentual.

width.description: Specifies the width of the element

wrap.description: Specifies how the text in a text area is to be wrapped when submitted in a form
